Function reference

version 0.2.0.9000

Shiny App

Launch Shiny App

  • ds_launch_shiny_app
  • launch_descriptr

Data Screening

The screener() function will screen data frames and return details such as variable names, class, levels and missing values. The plot.screener() creates bar plots to visualize % of missing observations for each variable in a data frame.

Screen Data Frames

  • ds_screener
  • screener
  • plot.ds_screener

Descriptive Statistics

The following functions ease the process of generating and visualizing descriptive statistics for categorical and continuous data.

descriptr

  • descriptr
  • descriptr-package

Two Way Tables

  • ds_cross_table
  • cross_table
  • plot.ds_cross_table
  • mosaicplot.ds_cross_table

Frequency Distribution of Continuous Data

  • ds_freq_cont
  • freq_cont
  • hist.ds_freq_cont

Frequency Table: Categorical Data

  • ds_freq_table
  • freq_table
  • barplot.ds_freq_table

Descriptive Statistics By Group

  • ds_group_summary
  • group_summary
  • boxplot.ds_group_summary

Multiple Variable Statistics

  • ds_multi_stats
  • multistats

Multiple One & Two Way Tables

  • ds_oway_tables
  • oway_tables
  • ds_tway_tables
  • tway_tables

Descriptive Statistics

  • ds_summary_stats
  • summary_stats

Distributions

Visualize how different parameters affect the shape of a distribution. Compute/visualize probability from a given quantile and quantiles out of given probability.

Visualize Binomial Distribution

  • dist_binom_plot
  • binom_plot
  • dist_binom_prob
  • binom_prob
  • dist_binom_perc
  • binom_perc

Visualize Chi Square Distribution

  • dist_chi_plot
  • chi_plot
  • dist_chi_perc
  • chi_per
  • dist_chi_prob
  • chi_prob

Visualize F Distribution

  • dist_f_plot
  • f_plot
  • dist_f_perc
  • f_per
  • dist_f_prob
  • f_prob

Visualize Normal Distribution

  • dist_norm_plot
  • norm_plot
  • dist_norm_perc
  • norm_per
  • dist_norm_prob
  • norm_prob

Visualize t Distribution

  • dist_t_plot
  • t_plot
  • dist_t_perc
  • t_per
  • dist_t_prob
  • t_prob

Data

descriptr comes with a built-in dataset hsb which is used to illustrate the functions as well as for running tests.

High School and Beyond Data Set

  • hsb
